snippet: Mark Cavendish of Britain sprinted to victory in the 13th stage of the Giro d’Italia, but Vincenzo Nibali of Italy kept the overall lead.
abstract: Mark Cavendish of Britain wins 13th stage of Giro d’Italia cycling race, but Vincenzo Nibali of Italy keeps overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish of Britain sprinted to victory in the 13th stage of the Giro d’Italia, but Vincenzo Nibali of Italy kept the overall lead.

headline.seo: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy Maintains Lead in Giro d’Italia
headline.main: Italian Maintains Lead in Giro d’Italia
